description: Zed Business Layer - Facade: The method Spryker\Zed\ProductLabelCollector\Business\ProductLabelCollectorFacade::runLabelDictionaryStorageCollector() has 2 factory calls and violates the rule "Every Facade method should have no more than one factory call.".
